author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Grifols Expands Its Blood Typing Solutions Portfolio In US With Antisera Reagents
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Grifols SA:
* GRIFOLS EXPANDS ITS BLOOD TYPING SOLUTIONS PORTFOLIO IN THE UNITED STATES WITH ANTISERA REAGENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
